components.name: AdkExpansionPanelComponent
ButtonComponent
components.template:
<!-- Button Variants -->
<button
  class="select-none rounded-lg py-3 px-6 text-center align-middle font-sans text-xs font-bold uppercase transition-all {{
    disabled ? (disabledStyle$ | async) : (color$ | async)
  }}"
  type="{{ type }}"
  [disabled]="disabled"
>
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</button>

components.name: ButtonWrapperComponent
components.template: <adk-button [disabled]="disabled" [color]="color" [variant]="variant"> Content for ng-content goes here </adk-button>

components.name: SortableIconComponent
components.template:
<svg
    xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
    fill="none"
    viewBox="0 0 24 24"
    stroke-width="2"
    stroke="currentColor"
    aria-hidden="true"
    class="w-4 h-4"
>

</svg>
